adDetails: Have you ever wanted to learn more about your Jewish heritage, and explore a world of sublime spirituality? Join me, Cantor Heath Rosenzweig, for an exciting journey into the treasures of Judaism. Subjects include: -Fundamentals and basics of Judaism -How to pray -Bar/bat mitzvah lessons and complete Jewish education for your children -Beginner's Biblical Hebrew and reading from Chumash (Torah) and siddur (prayer book) -Exciting and inspirational Jewish song -How to chant from the Torah and other books, and how to lead services yourself, including basic cantorial singing (chazzanut) I am a young, dynamic cantor in NYC with 20 years experience. References furnished upon request. Lessons in-person in New York, and via Skype to the world.
